fields.description: The specific sub-set of BOM event requested
The type of the BOM event
The current status of the event.
The time that the event was submitted for processing
The user who submitted the request to perform the event, as described in <<userSummary,User Summary>>
The time that the event began processing. Null if the event is still queued
Message describing the error that occurred, if one has occurred. Null if the status is not ERROR
Meta data associated with the representation, as described in <<metadata,Meta Data>>
Meta data associated with the representation, as described in <<metadata,Meta Data>>
The total number of elements available in the result set
